comments:
I saved all my changes using ctrl-shift-s as I usually do, and I got an 
exception.

If it happens again, I'll attach more info to the bug-report, but mainly I 
reported it in case the exceptions are enough in themselves to point to the 
problem. 

?yvind

Looks like a CDT problem.  Could you annotate this PR with the exact version 
of CDT you are using.

BTW, in the install/update perspective, I can't install anything
newer than CDT 1.2.0.9, there is no "update now" button visible.

>Looks like a CDT problem.  Could you annotate this PR with 
>the exact version of CDT you are using.

CDT 1.2.0.9.

?yvind

This was fix int 1.2.1 (newest builds).

Reopen if it happens again.

thanks for the heads up.
